song_name: The Way You Do The Things You Do
lyrics:
11 contributorsthe way you do the things you do lyricsverse 1
you got a smile so bright
you know you couldve been a candle
im holding you so tight
you know you couldve been a handle
the way you swept me off my feet
you know you couldve been a broom
and baby you smell so sweet
you know you couldve been some perfume

chorus
well you couldve been anything that you wanted to
i can tell
the way you do the things you do
i like the way you do the things you do

verse 2
as pretty as you are
you know you couldve been a flower
if good looks were minutes
you know you could have been an hour
the way you stole my heart
you know you could have been a crook
and baby your so smart
you know you could have been a school book
see ub40 liveget tickets as low as 44you might also likechorus
well you couldve been anything that you wanted to
i can tell
the way you do the things you do
i like the way you do the things you do

verse 3
you make my life so rich
you know you couldve been some money
and baby youre so sweet
you know you could have been some honey

chorus
well you couldve been anything that you wanted to
i can tell
the way you do the things you do
i like the way you do the things you do

verse 4
as pretty as you are
you know you couldve been a flower
if good looks were minutes
you know you couldve been an hour
the way you stole my heart
you know you couldve been a crook
and baby your so smart
you know you could have been a school book
